CustomField.description: Indicates if Case was Resolved before the SLA Deadline
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( CaseResolvedDate__c )), CaseResolvedDate__c <= SlaDeadline__c ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if Case was Resolved before the SLA Deadline
CustomField.label: Case Resolved in SLA
